summary: Liked the coolsims very much, so the new ApachiiSkyHair is my favor too ;) But i wanted my texture on it. i also tried myself on new beardtextures ;)
descriptionHtml:
My other: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25130]	
Sir Crocoliles Hook[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22012]Garrisons Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17064]The Alligator[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19383]Green Dragon Crescent Blade[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16193]Bleach weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15268]D-Greyman weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14786]Soul Eater weapons[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14968]Stormbringer[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14616]Black Sword, Yoru[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14020]Rorona Zorros Katanas[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357]ApachiiSkyHair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4400]My Coolsims retexture mod[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4734]Vampire Gameplay Overhaul[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5521]Rans and Yinsiyue Hairstyles Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6720]Kuma Kuma Kokuma Hair and Bagserk Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5152]Beautiful Hair Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7752]Iron Claw Daggers Fist Weapons Retexture[/url]|[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12797]Soulfang & Darkfang[/url]

======================================================================
Please read the whole wall of text , u have to download something from an other site!
Right click new tab on pics for better compare
======================================================================

-> 1. Description
-> 2. Install
-> 3. Recommend Downloads
-> 4. Troubleshooting/Tipps
-> 5. Credits

===================================
1. Description
===================================

ApachiiSkyHair v. 1.4, ApachiiSkyHair Female and ApachiiSkyHair Male retextured. perhaps u like it. Save the endorsements for Apachii.
I also gave the original beard textures some love, or i tried ;)

===================================
2. Install
===================================

!Before install!
================

Save your Beautiful Hair/Coolsims or whatever Hair mod u use.


========
Install:
========

1. Download and install ApachiiSkyHair:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] 

2. Download my Pack and extract into Skyrim dir 

Done


===================================
3. Recommend Downloads
===================================

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6483]Custom NON-VANILLA Hair for NPCs Tutorial by hulebjoern[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923]Extended Slider Colors by Expired[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4554]Skyrim NPC Editor 0_60 Beta 1_7 by foretrenty[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131]FXAA Post Process Injector by some_dude[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2531]AntiFREEZE performance patch 9 ENBSeries by Boris Vorontsov[/url]

===================================
4. Troubleshooting/Tipps
===================================


You can use the Hairstyles for men too. go to Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/female copy contents, make new dir in Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair named Male so its Skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/hair/male past in, 

have fun ;)

===================================
5. Credits

===================================

Thanks to Anto from coolsims.net
Thanks to Lucha for original mod for Oblivion
Thanks to newermind43 for bringing the Styles to Skyim
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim
Thanks to AnOldFriend
Apachii - Conversions of sims 2 hair, rigging, alpha/textures edits.
Thanks to Original authors, without them there would be no hairs.
=================================
Original authors for Sims2 hair:
=================================
Anto - http://www.coolsims.net/ - http://coolsimsnet.blogspot.com/
Peggy - http://www.peggyzone.com/
NewSea - http://www.newseasims.com/
Nouk - http://www.noukiesims2.net/ - http://www.modthesims.info/m/23182
Kozaburo - http://digitalbabes.jp/
Studio Maya - http://www.3digitalc...load/index.html
Lunar Eclipse -http://www.modthesims.info/member.php?u=155845
Raonjena Sims - http://www.raonsims.com/
